Re Christmas Spiritfor the info I actually am involved in an adopt a family program here in SF Happy Holdiays MJ wrote Hello everyone and Happy Holidays Although the equities markets havent been that good to us this year most of us can say that we enjoyed a pretty prosperous year I also know that it is the time of the year that it seems like everyone is wanting you to contribute to one thing or another and you are just wondering how you are going to get everything done before Christmas or the New Year You may already be involved in an activity that is helping those less fortunate than yourselves make it through a tough holiday season but I wanted to give you a chance to help someone in the case that you wanted to share your prosperity but didnt have the opportunity I am a member of a team from the Enron Portland office not sponsored by Enron itself in adopting a family to help in a time of need This family consists of a single mother separated from her husband for a few short months with an year old daughter and an year old son This family is living in a one bedroom apartment on per month from child support This young woman is looking for a job Our team is collecting money to shop for gifts clothes needed household items food and a couple of toys We are also accepting wrapped gifts consisting of the same We will be visiting this family in a couple of weeks to find out more about what they need and then again to deliver our items on December st I am excited about being involved with this project because I will be meeting this family and will be directly involved in providing them items that I know I take for granted If you are interested in contributing either cash or a gift not only will it be appreciated it will be tax deductible This family is sponsored by the Salvation Army and they will be sending receipts directly to each donor If you would like to contribute you can send your donation to me at either home or at work Checks can be made out to me or to our captain Jeffrey Oh We will need your address if I dont already have it to send to the Salvation Army so you will get a receipt We will be required to submit receipts for the items we buy as well as a pledge sheet with your name address adn donation amount to the Salvation Army If you have any questions please give me a call Thanks in advance for any of you that are interested And again I wish you all the best for the holidays Kim Do You Yahoo Yahoo Shopping Thousands of Stores Millions of Products

ANSIXQReFwAnIrishWishFGood luck Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston To Angie Conner Email Brad Fagan Email Cathy Pocock Email Chris Todd Email Cindy Tarsi Email Elizabeth Jordan Email Eric Strickland Email Gayleen Barrett Email Ginger Michael Brown Email Harriet Turk Email Slone Jeanie Jerry Ward Email John Schilke Email Lisa Barnwell Email Linda Ward Elam Email Lisa Rosenberg Email Lyndon Clark Email Mary Beer Ellen Email Melissa Reese Email Natalie Boehmer Email Tina lovett Email Tricia Tlapek Email Wes Kersey Email Yonnie Waller Email Cross Edith Vann Suzanne Sent Monday October AM Subject FW Fw An Irish Wish In a message dated AM Pacific Standard Time Hbskuro writes An Irish Wish You had better send this back Good Luck I hope it works May there always be work for your hands to do May your purse always hold a coin or two May the sun always shine on your windowpane May a rainbow be certain to follow each rain May the hand of a friend always be near you May God fill your heart with gladness to cheer you Ok this is what you have to do Send this to ALL of your friends But you HAVE to send this within hour from when you open it Now Make A wish I hope you made your wish Now then if you send to person your wish will be granted in year people months people months people month people weeks people week people days people days people days people day people hours if you send it of your friends you will automatically have years of good luck Believe in yourself know what you want and make it happen Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp This email is Re Christmas Spiritfor the info I actually am involved in an adopt a family program here in SF Happy Holdiays MJ wrote Hello everyone and Happy Holidays Although the equities markets havent been that good to us this year most of us can say that we enjoyed a pretty prosperous year I also know that it is the time of the year that it seems like everyone is wanting you to contribute to one thing or another and you are just wondering how you are going to get everything done before Christmas or the New Year You may already be involved in an activity that is helping those less fortunate than yourselves make it through a tough holiday season but I wanted to give you a chance to help someone in the case that you wanted to share your prosperity but didnt have the opportunity I am a member of a team from the Enron Portland office not sponsored by Enron itself in adopting a family to help in a time of need This family consists of a single mother separated from her husband for a few short months with an year old daughter and an year old son This family is living in a one bedroom apartment on per month from child support This young woman is looking for a job Our team is collecting money to shop for gifts clothes needed household items food and a couple of toys We are also accepting wrapped gifts consisting of the same We will be visiting this family in a couple of weeks to find out more about what they need and then again to deliver our items on December st I am excited about being involved with this project because I will be meeting this family and will be directly involved in providing them items that I know I take for granted If you are interested in contributing either cash or a gift not only will it be appreciated it will be tax deductible This family is sponsored by the Salvation Army and they will be sending receipts directly to each donor If you would like to contribute you can send your donation to me at either home or at work Checks can be made out to me or to our captain Jeffrey Oh We will need your address if I dont already have it to send to the Salvation Army so you will get a receipt We will be required to submit receipts for the items we buy as well as a pledge sheet with your name address adn donation amount to the Salvation Army If you have any questions please give me a call Thanks in advance for any of you that are interested And again I wish you all the best for the holidays Kim Do You Yahoo Yahoo Shopping Thousands of Stores Millions of Products

Re looking at coming to sfoSounds good I will be around MJ Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston To Mary Beer Ellen Email Sent Tuesday November AM Subject looking at coming to sfo MJ How are you doing Things here are definitely roller coaster status but stablizing a bit How was your wine tour I thought about you guys It looked like so much fun Elliot is thinking about having people come to Stinson Dec and and I was thinking about coming a day early or leaving a day later or maybe both I am thinking that you might be out of town around there but If you are around I would like to get together with you if it all works out Let me know what you think And I hope all is going well for you Kim This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
